messageBody:
> Today I finally ran into something I
> couldn't solve cleanly: how does one write tests for code that spawns
> threads, where the threads can throw exceptions?

You could read the chapter on threads from "Unit Testing in Java":
http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/1558608680/

You find the library used there in the files section of this group:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/files/src/threadedtesting.jar

Johannes
